channel.title: Retarded Bank?
channel.description:
Every time I go (well scar goes) to bank on my (people's scripts i downloaded) scripts, for some stupid reason my mouse hovers the stupid bank like a obese downsindrum trying to play football with 2 left feet! Can i receive any help at all? I'm sure this is a problem for other people, or maybe in future, and I would much rather get this over and done with.
;)Ty for any help put into this, p.s. when i download and get to properly test the scripts, than I will reply to whom i downloaded the script of off with feedback and most likely possitive reaction to how the script works, I'm not one of those leecher thingies, I'm new to this and wan't to participate for free script making to make things easier for all! :D
Your's Toffloff (Please recognize me as Tobiaza, i forgot tobiaza's pass rofl)

Nice one dudeoftheed that imformation is critical to our success of mighty scripting

Thanks,
But it was introduced many moons ago.

item.title: Retarded Bank?
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:5, topic:96422”]Yea, I heard that the banking procedure isnt working at the moment
Hopefully it wont take long to update SRL, because I’ve been trying to study peoples scripts, and I can’t test any banking without it.[/quote]
Yes, SRL have introduced a new banking procedure. But you’ll have to install it manually. It is found on the SRL-Forums!

Read full topic

I’m not sure if it’s been fixed yet, just have a little try and find out.

item.title: Retarded Bank?
item.dc:creator: @Toffloff Toffloff
item.description:
@Toffloff wrote:

So let me guess? Does is every one in the same situation as me at this moment in time? Doesn’t SRL 3.07 repell this new bank update?
Ty for the post The Un-Named, You have most likely answerd this question to all those who have viewed my post… During the awaiting of the new SRL, i’ll go pump my body up rofl, I have just finished my ict gcse with A atm so can start scripting soon (when i say i got a A, it’s because it’s this coursework thing, the teechers have a look at and then send of with a grade :D)
All those people out there who are waiting the new SRL just use powerchoppers/miners or what ever you use without a bank procedure

Yours Tobiaza

Read full topic

item.title: Retarded Bank?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Jagex moved the bank screen slightly, so just wait for the new SRL version to come out. Shouldn’t take long.

Toffloff:

I’m not one of those leecher thingies

Don’t worry, if you had read the rules, we aren’t an anti-leech community(meh, moparisthebest.com/smf(child forums) is pro-leech), but by all means, get into scripting, it’s really helpful to us and you.

Read full topic
